meanings.definition: Unable to be separated or parted.
meanings.sent1: The inseparables twins always did everything together.
meanings.sent2: The bond between the inseparables friends was unbreakable.
meanings.sent3: The inseparables socks kept getting mixed up in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like inseparables puzzle pieces fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent5: The inseparables magnets clung tightly to each other.

meanings.definition: People or things that are closely connected and cannot be separated.
meanings.sent1: The inseparables, Tom and Jerry, were always seen together.
meanings.sent2: The inseparables of the group were always the first to arrive.
meanings.sent3: The inseparables pair of shoes were always left by the door.
meanings.sent4: Their love was like inseparables vines intertwining and growing together.
meanings.sent5: The inseparables duo performed a beautiful duet on stage.
